subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ruslan Fedotenko and Artem Anisimov scored first-period goals, and Martin Biron made 24 saves in his Ranger debut as the Rangers beat the Toronto Maple Leafs, 2-1, on Thursday night in Toronto.
snippet: Ruslan Fedotenko and Artem Anisimov scored first-period goals, and Martin Biron made 24 saves in his Ranger debut as the Rangers beat the Toronto Maple Leafs, 2-1, on Thursday night in Toronto.
